test_strategy_covers_unit_integration_e2.details: Strategy covers unit (36 tests), integration (execution order tests T55-T57), performance (T66-T67), regression (T64-T65). Security and E2E not applicable for this hook-level bug fix.

test_cases_exist_for_all_requirements.details: 23 ACs across 5 FRs all have dedicated test cases. See traceability-matrix.csv.

traceability_matrix_complete_100_percent.details: 23/23 ACs mapped to 36 test cases (T32-T67). Zero orphan ACs, zero orphan tests.

coverage_targets_defined.details: 100% AC coverage target. 36 new tests + 31 existing = 67 total in file. Performance budget: <100ms total, <10ms V8 overhead.

test_data_strategy_documented.details: test-data-plan.md defines disk state fixtures, incoming state fixtures, tool event types, and data cleanup strategy.

critical_paths_identified.details: Critical paths: (1) phase index regression blocking (T32, T58), (2) phase_status regression blocking (T39-T41), (3) fail-open on errors (T46-T52), (4) execution order V7->V8->V1-V3 (T55-T57).

article_II.details: Test cases designed in Phase 05 before implementation (Phase 06). Follows test-first development.

article_VII.details: Traceability matrix maps all 23 ACs to test cases with 100% coverage. No orphan requirements.

article_IX.details: GATE-05 validated with all checklist items passing. No items skipped or waived.

article_XI.details: Integration tests T55-T57 validate execution order between V7, V8, and V1-V3 rules. Boundary tests T58-T63 cover edge cases.
